// News View article in web browser Favourites Details "Author: Sean Di Rienzo 
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions: 
1- Long Press to Delete 
" "2 - Normal Press to view details 
" "Author: Sean Di Rienzo 
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions: 
1- Click 'Add to Favourites' to save the article for later 
" "2 - Click 'View in browser' to open the article in a browser 
" "Author: Sean Di Rienzo 
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions: 
1- Enter a search term 
" "2 - Press 'Search' button 
" + "3 - Click an article from the list to view more details 
" + "4 - Click 'Favourites' to view your list of saved articles 
"; // CarCharging Find Location Title: Contact Telephone Number: Enter latitude Latitude: Longitude: Enter longitude Load Directions In Google Maps See List Of Favourite Stations Author: Svitlana Tsushka
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions:
1- Enter latitude and longitude
 2 - Press "Search" button
 3 - Click a station from the list and see detailed information
 4 - Click "Load location in Google Maps" to see location of a station
 5 - Click "Add to favourites" to add a location to the list of favourite stations
 6 - Click "See list of favourite station' to go to the next page with favourite stations
 7 - Click "Delete" to delete a station from the list of favourite stations
